title: Track Awesome Qr Code Updates Weekly
_seo_title: Track Awesome Qr Code (make-github-pseudonymous-again/awesome-qr-code) Updates Weekly - Track Awesome List
description: A curated list of awesome QR code libraries, software and resources

items.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Jun 10 - Jun 16, 2024
items.summary: 1 awesome projects updated on Jun 10 - Jun 16, 2024
items.content_text:
### Libraries / Ruby

*   [rqrcode `W` (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/whomwah/rqrcode) - A neat Ruby QR code generator exporting to `svg`, `png` and `ansi` with configurable size, color and other attributes.
items.content_html:
Libraries / Ruby

  • rqrcode W (⭐1.9k) - A neat Ruby QR code generator exporting to svg, png and ansi with configurable size, color and other attributes.

items.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Jul 11 - Jul 17, 2022
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on Jul 11 - Jul 17, 2022
items.content_text:
### CLI / File Transfer

*   [qrscan (⭐177)](https://github.com/sayanarijit/qrscan) - Scan a QR code in the terminal using the system camera or a given image.
*   [qrcode.show](https://qrcode.show) - Generate QR codes using curl.
items.content_html:
CLI / File Transfer

  • qrscan (⭐177) - Scan a QR code in the terminal using the system camera or a given image.
  • qrcode.show - Generate QR codes using curl.

items.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on May 23 - May 29, 2022
items.summary: 2 awesome projects updated on May 23 - May 29, 2022
items.content_text:
### CLI / File Transfer

*   [qrap (⭐7)](https://github.com/make-github-pseudonymous-again/qrap) - Generate a QR code payload for Wi-Fi access point credentials.
*   [spqr (⭐2)](https://github.com/make-github-pseudonymous-again/spqr) - Generate a QR code payload for initiating a SEPA transfer.
items.content_html:
CLI / File Transfer

  • qrap (⭐7) - Generate a QR code payload for Wi-Fi access point credentials.
  • spqr (⭐2) - Generate a QR code payload for initiating a SEPA transfer.

items.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Feb 22 - Feb 28, 2021
items.summary: 19 awesome projects updated on Feb 22 - Feb 28, 2021
items.content_text:
### Libraries / C

*   [libqrencode `W` (⭐2.7k)](https://github.com/fukuchi/libqrencode) - A fast and compact library for encoding data in a QR code symbol.

### Libraries / C, C++, JavaScript, Python, Java, Rust

*   [QR-Code-generator `W` (⭐5.9k)](https://github.com/nayuki/QR-Code-generator) - High-quality QR code generator library in Java, TypeScript/JavaScript, Python, C++, C, Rust.

### Libraries / Java

*   [Qart `W` (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/scola/Qart) - An app to merge a picture and a QR code.

### Libraries / JavaScript

*   [instascan `R` (⭐3k)](https://github.com/schmich/instascan) - HTML5 QR code scanner using your webcam.
*   [qrious `W` (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/neocotic/qrious) - Pure JavaScript library for QR code generation using canvas.

### Libraries / TypeScript

*   [jsQR `R` (⭐3.9k)](https://github.com/cozmo/jsQR) - A pure JavaScript QR code reading library.

### Libraries / React

*   [qrcode.react `W` (⭐4.1k)](https://github.com/zpao/qrcode.react) - A `<QRCode/>` component for use with React.

### Libraries / React Native

*   [react-native-qrcode-scanner `R` (⭐2k)](https://github.com/moaazsidat/react-native-qrcode-scanner) - A QR code scanner component for React Native.

### Libraries / Vue

*   [vue-qrcode-reader `R` (⭐2.2k)](https://github.com/gruhn/vue-qrcode-reader) - A set of Vue.js components for detecting and decoding QR codes.

### Libraries / Python

*   [sylnsfar/qrcode `W` (⭐11k)](https://github.com/sylnsfar/qrcode) - Artistic QR code in Python (can produce GIFs).

### Libraries / Objective-C

*   [SGQRCode `R` (⭐1.7k)](https://github.com/kingsic/SGQRCode) - Easy to use QR code scan library for iOS.

### Libraries / Swift

*   [EFQRCode `W` (⭐4.7k)](https://github.com/EFPrefix/EFQRCode) - A better way to operate QR code in Swift, support iOS, macOS, watchOS and tvOS.

### Libraries / C#

*   [QRCoder `W` (⭐4.9k)](https://github.com/codebude/QRCoder) - A pure C# Open Source QR code implementation.

### Libraries / Android

*   [BGAQRCode-Android `RW` (⭐8k)](https://github.com/bingoogolapple/BGAQRCode-Android) - QR code reader and generator written in C.
*   [AwesomeQRCode (Kotlin) `W` (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/SumiMakito/AwesomeQRCode) - An awesome QR code generator for Android (can produce GIFs).

### Libraries / PHP

*   [php-qrcode-detector-decoder `R` (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/khanamiryan/php-qrcode-detector-decoder) - PHP library to detect and decode QR codes.
*   [simple-qrcode `W` (⭐2.8k)](https://github.com/SimpleSoftwareIO/simple-qrcode) - An easy-to-use PHP QR code generator.
*   [endroid/qr-code `W` (⭐4.6k)](https://github.com/endroid/qr-code) - QR code generator.
*   [BaconQRCode `W` (⭐2k)](https://github.com/Bacon/BaconQRCode) - QR code generator for PHP.
items.content_html:
Libraries / C

  • libqrencode W (⭐2.7k) - A fast and compact library for encoding data in a QR code symbol.

Libraries / C, C++, JavaScript, Python, Java, Rust

  • QR-Code-generator W (⭐5.9k) - High-quality QR code generator library in Java, TypeScript/JavaScript, Python, C++, C, Rust.

Libraries / Java

  • Qart W (⭐1.1k) - An app to merge a picture and a QR code.

Libraries / JavaScript

  • instascan R (⭐3k) - HTML5 QR code scanner using your webcam.
  • qrious W (⭐1.6k) - Pure JavaScript library for QR code generation using canvas.

Libraries / TypeScript

  • jsQR R (⭐3.9k) - A pure JavaScript QR code reading library.

Libraries / React

  • qrcode.react W (⭐4.1k) - A <QRCode/> component for use with React.

Libraries / React Native

  • react-native-qrcode-scanner R (⭐2k) - A QR code scanner component for React Native.

Libraries / Vue

  • vue-qrcode-reader R (⭐2.2k) - A set of Vue.js components for detecting and decoding QR codes.

Libraries / Python

  • sylnsfar/qrcode W (⭐11k) - Artistic QR code in Python (can produce GIFs).

Libraries / Objective-C

  • SGQRCode R (⭐1.7k) - Easy to use QR code scan library for iOS.

Libraries / Swift

  • EFQRCode W (⭐4.7k) - A better way to operate QR code in Swift, support iOS, macOS, watchOS and tvOS.

Libraries / C#

  • QRCoder W (⭐4.9k) - A pure C# Open Source QR code implementation.

Libraries / Android

  • BGAQRCode-Android RW (⭐8k) - QR code reader and generator written in C.
  • AwesomeQRCode (Kotlin) W (⭐1.9k) - An awesome QR code generator for Android (can produce GIFs).

Libraries / PHP

  • php-qrcode-detector-decoder R (⭐1.4k) - PHP library to detect and decode QR codes.
  • simple-qrcode W (⭐2.8k) - An easy-to-use PHP QR code generator.
  • endroid/qr-code W (⭐4.6k) - QR code generator.
  • BaconQRCode W (⭐2k) - QR code generator for PHP.

items.title: Awesome Qr Code Updates on Oct 05 - Oct 11, 2020
items.summary: 5 awesome projects updated on Oct 05 - Oct 11, 2020
items.content_text:
### Apps / Readers

*   [Web App (⭐1.1k)](https://github.com/code-kotis/qr-code-scanner) - A progressive web application to scan QR codes.

### Apps / File Transfer

*   [qrcp (⭐10k)](https://github.com/claudiodangelis/qrcp) - Transfer files over Wi-Fi from your computer to a mobile device by scanning a QR code without leaving the terminal.
*   [qr-filetransfer (⭐996)](https://github.com/sdushantha/qr-filetransfer) - Transfer files over Wi-Fi between your computer and your smartphone from the terminal.

### CLI / File Transfer

*   [qrencode](https://fukuchi.org/works/qrencode) - Command line tool to generate QR codes.

### Resources / PHP

*   [zxing (⭐33k)](https://github.com/zxing/zxing/wiki/Barcode-Contents) - QR code payload format catalog.
items.content_html:
Apps / Readers

  • Web App (⭐1.1k) - A progressive web application to scan QR codes.

Apps / File Transfer

  • qrcp (⭐10k) - Transfer files over Wi-Fi from your computer to a mobile device by scanning a QR code without leaving the terminal.
  • qr-filetransfer (⭐996) - Transfer files over Wi-Fi between your computer and your smartphone from the terminal.

CLI / File Transfer

  • qrencode - Command line tool to generate QR codes.

Resources / PHP

  • zxing (⭐33k) - QR code payload format catalog.
